Articles.Content:
PROJECT SCORPIO

Hi guys and welcome to my first fanfic, 'Project Scorpio'. This story will chronicle the tales of Jeb Kerman and co. as they attempt to get to the Mun and beyond before the rival Union of Kerbalist Republics (UKR). I hope you all will enjoy.

P.S.: Sorry, but I won't upload any pics during the course of writing. Please accept this.

JSeki0017
Nice welcome to the forums as well you should comment on stuff so you can post without having a moderator to see you good and stuff.
